rules_text:
Deathtouch
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, call The Beast. [i](You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)[/i]
Whenever you call The Beast, you may pay {B}. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
